newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Advanced Micro raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Advanced Micro raised.

text.p: Lehman Brothers said Tuesday it upgraded Advanced Micro Devices Inc to buy from hold.
-- Cited company's announcement Monday it had won a contract to supply microprocessors to International Business Machines Corp.
-- Shares fell 1-3/4 to 40-3/4. On Monday AMD shares jumped five to 42-1/2.
